description: This file defines SQLAlchemy ORM models for a Tic Tac Toe web application, including classes for Player, Game, and Move, with their respective database mappings and relationships.

classes.name: Player
classes.description: Represents a player in the Tic Tac Toe game, with attributes for ID, name, creation timestamp, and relationships to games played as X or O.

classes.name: Game
classes.description: Represents a Tic Tac Toe game, including attributes for game state, board configuration, players involved, and methods to get/set the board as a list.

classes.name: Move
classes.description: Represents a move within a game, including move details such as position, player symbol, move number, and constraints to ensure uniqueness.

methods.name: get_board_list
methods.description: Returns the current game board as a list of characters.

methods.name: set_board_list
methods.description: Sets the game board from a list of characters.
